description:
Engulfed by despair, Myr sets out to on a rampage to destroy everything. Seth responds to Myr`s rampage by flying further out of control, and ends up captured by Ullmina. As the biggest crisis yet closes in, Ocoho grills the disheartened Queen Boudica on who she truly is. Encouraged by Ocoho`s words, Queen Boudica gets back on her feet to destroy the Harmonizium. With the help of Grimm and Dragunov, Melie rescues Seth, who returns to his right mind and sets out to stop Myr`s rampage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Bouquet of Flowers for This Land: Fantasia
Kono Daichi ni Hanataba o: Fantasia
Une gerbe pour ces terres: Fantasia
